sentences.sContent: The patriarch of the house, Mr. Jawad, rules it with a ferocity renowned throughout the neighbourhood.
sentences.sCn: 那户人家的家长贾瓦德先生治家严苛，名闻乡里。

remMethod.val: patri(父亲) + arch(统治) → 男性统治者 → 家长， 族长

words.tran: 家长的；族长的；由族长统治的
父权制；家长统治；父系社会

trans.tranOther: an old man who is respected as the head of a family or tribe
